org.csstudio.platform.model
Class AbstractControlSystemItemFactory<T extends IControlSystemItem>

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.model.AbstractControlSystemItemFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a type parameter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArchiveDataSourceFactory, ProcessVariableFactory, TextContainerFactory
public abstract class AbstractControlSystemItemFactory<T extends IControlSystemItem>
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines the callback interface for the extension point org.csstudio.platform.controlSystemItemFactories. Please refer to the documentation of that extension point for further details. A control system item factory, is responsible for the creation of a certain type of control system items. These items have to implement IControlSystemItem.

Author:
Sven Wende

Method Detail

createStringRepresentationFromItem

protected abstract java.lang.String createStringRepresentationFromItem(T item)
Creates a String representation for the specified control system item. This method corresponds to createItemFromStringRepresentation(String) and should be coded with the same String representation in mind.

Parameters:
item - the control system item
Returns:
a String representation of the item

createItemFromStringRepresentation

protected abstract T createItemFromStringRepresentation(java.lang.String string)
Creates a control system item from the specified String representation. This method corresponds to createStringRepresentationFromItem(IControlSystemItem) and should be coded with the same String representation in mind.

Parameters:
string - a string representation
Returns:
a control system item or null, if none could be obtained from the specified String representation

createControlSystemItem

public final T createControlSystemItem(ControlSystemItemPath path)
Creates a control system item for the specified path.

Parameters:
path - a path
Returns:
a control system item or null, if none could be obtained from the specified path

getTransportablePath

public final ControlSystemItemPath getTransportablePath(T item)
Creates a path for the specified control system item.

Parameters:
item - a control system item
Returns:
the corresponding path
